cz.syntea.xdef.util

Class XValidate

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.syntea.xdef.util.XValidate

  • public class XValidate
extends java.lang.Object
    Validation of XML document with given X-definition.

    Also provides main method for calling the program from command line. (see main(String[]))

    • Method Summary

                                  java.io.File xmlFile,
                                  ReportWriter repw)
        Validate xml file with given definition.
        Parameters:
        props - properties to be set to X-definitions.
        xmlFile - The file with XML.
        repw - Report writer.
        Returns:
        The XDDocument object or null if the XDDocument was not created.

        props - properties to be set to X-definitions.
        xmlFile - The file with XML.
        xdefFiles - Array of files with definitions.
        rootDefName - Name of root definition.
        repw - Report writer.

        The XDDocument object or null if the XDDocument was not created.

      • validate

        public static XDDocument validate(java.util.Properties props,
                                  java.io.File xmlFile,
                                  java.io.File poolFile,
                                  java.io.File[] xdefFiles,
                                  java.lang.String rootDefName,
                                  ReportWriter repw)
        Validate XML file with given definition.
        Parameters:
        props - properties to be set to X-definitions.
        xmlFile - The file with XML.
        poolFile - The file with XDPool or null.
        xdefFiles - Array of files with definitions.
        rootDefName - Name of root definition.
        repw - Report writer.
        Returns:
        The XDDocument object or null if the XDDocument was not created.

      • validate

        public static XDDocument validate(java.util.Properties props,
                                  java.lang.Class<?>[] ext,
                                  cz.syntea.xdef.impl.code.DefOutStream out,
                                  cz.syntea.xdef.impl.code.DefInStream in,
                                  java.lang.Object userObj,
                                  java.io.File xmlFile,
                                  java.io.File[] xdefFiles,
                                  java.lang.String rootDefName,
                                  ReportWriter repw)
        Validate XML file with given definition.
        Parameters:
        props - properties to be set to X-definitions.
        ext - The array of external classes with external methods or null.
        out - The DefOutStream used as standard output or null.
        in - The DefInStream used as standard input or null.
        userObj - The user object or null.
        xmlFile - The file with XML.
        xdefFiles - Array of files with definitions or null.
        rootDefName - Name of root definition.
        repw - Report writer; if null then an RuntimeEexception is thrown.
        Returns:
        XDDocument object or null if the XDDocument was not created.

      • validate

        public static XDDocument validate(java.util.Properties props,
                                  java.lang.Class<?>[] ext,
                                  cz.syntea.xdef.impl.code.DefOutStream out,

                                  ReportWriter repw)
        Validate XML file with given definition.
        Parameters:
        props - properties to be set to X-definitions.
        ext - The array of external classes with external methods or null.
        out - The DefOutStream used as standard output or null.
        in - The DefInStream used as standard input or null.
        userObj - The user object or null.
        xmlFile - The file with XML.
        poolFile - The file with XDPool or null.
        xdefFiles - Array of files with definitions or null.
        rootDefName - Name of root definition.
        repw - Report writer; if null then an RuntimeEexception is thrown.
        Returns:
        XDDocument object or null if the XDDocument was not created.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String... args)
        Validation of pool ox X-definitions. This method is possible to invoke from command line.
        Parameters:
        args - Array of strings containing command line arguments.

        Arguments:

        • -i file - input XML file to validate
        • -d file - input X-definition file(s)
        • -p file - input XDPool file
        • -l file - log file
        • -x name - name of X-definition
        • -h | -? - print help
